properties.entry: SELECT LIST_NO "번호", LIST_TITLE "할 일 제목", LIST_CHECK "완료 여부", TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') "등록 날짜" FROM TODO_LIST WHERE LIST_NO > 0 ORDER BY LIST_NO ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_TODO WHERE LIST_NO > 0 AND "등록 날짜" = 1
INSERT INTO TODO_LIST VALUES(SEQ_TODO_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
SELECT LIST_NO, LIST_TITLE, LIST_CHECK, LIST_COMPLETE, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ENROLL_DATE FROM TODO_LIST WHERE LIST_NO = ?
UPDATE TODO_LIST SET LIST_COMPLETE = DECODE(LIST_COMPLETE, 0, 1, 0) WHERE LIST_NO = ?
UPDATE TODO_LIST SET LIST_TITLE = ?, LIST_CHECK = ? WHERE TODO_NO = ?
